entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:28 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:27 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow or rain mixed with freezing rain changing to rain then changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:27 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:27 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
